blog.name: tododeku-talks
blog.title: Incorrect Quotes
blog.description:
Tododeku themed incorrect qoutes from the ship of two characters from My Hero Academia. Shoto Todoroki and Protagonist Izuku Midoriya. This is for fun, because I have a file on my computer with incorrect qoutes lol. Admin is @oxyphara
1 (For Now) Chat everyday from Monday - Friday *cough cough* ^-^

body:
Shoto: My hair might be straighter if I actually exercised my ability to use a brush.
Izuku, with a goofy smile on his face: You, straight? Never.
Shoto, laughing: True.
Uraraka pointing at Deku: Look at him, he's as straight as his curls. 
Tsu, holding hands with Uraraka: Spoiler Alert; Which is not very straight at all.

summary: Okay but imagine Bakugou getting one of those birthday cards that you can record your own voice message on and he has Shinsou...
body: Okay but imagine Bakugou getting one of those birthday cards that you can record your own voice message on and he has Shinsou use his voice changer to record a special message for Kirishima. When Bakugou gives the card to Kirishima and he opens it, it’s the voice of Crimson Riot wishing Kirishima a happy birthday and Kirishima fucking faints

summary: hey guys!! I try not to make a habit of this, but I need some help. I have a story that I worked on for 6 months that really...
body:
hey guys!! I try not to make a habit of this, but I need some help. I have a story that I worked on for 6 months that really needs a signal boost. I’m really proud of how it came out and I want to share it with more people! So if you could reblog this post and spread it around, it’d be greatly appreciated!

blog.name: lindleland
blog.title: space duck
blog.description: Formerly causeimgonnabullyyou / thedickisextremelyimportant. I go by Lind, Lindle, or Adam. But never Dave. That's a completely different name. Why would you even suggest that? 22/M/English/Pan, I hate anime and devote basically all of my waking hours to watching it. My main fandoms are Ace Attorney, LotGH, BNHA, and JoJo's.

blog.description: Aye, it’s just another mammal out here in these streets with irrelevancy so retro it’s almost relevant.

tags: this is stuck in my head
body:
Bnha Shower Thought

Okay so like, think of Aizawa and Monoma getting into an argument cuz Monoma’s a little shit and Aizawa isn’t having it today and is ready to throw hands.

Aizawa’s quirk is Eraser and and Monoma’s is Copy right?


If they had a fight, imagine Aizawa erasing his quirk but accidentally blinking. Monoma would of course touch him and get his quirk, riiiight?

So if they both have the quirk Eraser, in that moment, if they use it on each other at the same time-


Wouldn’t they both be quirkless forever because since they used it on eachother they cant undo it?

blog.description:

☆Please check the FAQ before asking anything thank you☆
☆Created 3/18/2019, no fics from before this date can appear here☆

title: Cracks Red on the Heart
description:
by Shippeh

“Oh, good. I’m so damn tired.” Kaminari laughed once, quietly, an exhausted sound, glancing towards the closed neighboring door. “Can you just like… okay, obviously you don’t wanna do this, and he’s not stupid enough not to realize that, but could you just maybe for a few hours pretend like you give a shit?”

Kirishima won’t sleep after the raid, and heroes shouldn’t have to sit alone.

Words: 3110, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Bakugou Katsuki, Kirishima Eijirou
  • Relationships: Bakugou Katsuki/Kirishima Eijirou
  • Additional Tags: Can definitely be read as platonic if you prefer, but i dont prefer so, Manga Spoilers

title: Primary Scars
description:
by Tinybelieverbug

Eventually, Izuku knew his class would find out about his scar,living together and all, but he didn’t think it would be this soon.
Everything is gonna go down hill from here, and Izuku doesn’t think he can handle it. Especially with Kacchan breathing down his neck about covering it up.

title: Blood Water
description:
by NightmareDemon

When Bakugō Katsuki’s love of animals leads him to a new job, and a new home, he never would have guessed the dangerous situations that he could have been placed in. Especially not when the lake near to his home housed one of the most dangerous predators under its bloody surface…
